frames.caption: A couple stands on a rooftop terrace, embracing as they gaze at each other against the backdrop of a stunning sunset over a historic city. The sky is painted with vibrant oranges and yellows, casting a warm glow over the scene. A prominent dome and classic architecture are visible in the background, enhancing the romantic atmosphere.
frames.description: The scene captures a romantic moment between a couple on a rooftop in a historic city, likely during sunset. The setting sun casts a warm glow over the cityscape, highlighting the architectural beauty of the buildings and the prominent dome.

frames.caption: A couple stands on a rooftop overlooking a cityscape at sunset. The sky is ablaze with orange and gold hues, casting a warm glow over the historic architecture. The couple gazes at each other, creating a romantic and serene atmosphere.
frames.description: The scene captures a romantic moment between a couple on a rooftop with a stunning view of a city at sunset. The backdrop features a prominent dome and classic architecture, suggesting a historical European city. The warm colors of the sunset enhance the intimate and peaceful mood.

summary: People: couple. Nature: sunset, clouds, sky. Objects: dome, buildings, rooftop. Actions: gazing, embracing. Emotions: romantic, warm, serene. Scenes: cityscape, sunset view, rooftop. Concepts: romance, architecture, historic, tranquility
